MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL54 postcode area of Caernarfon affecting properties in Bron Arfon, Carmel Terrace, Maes Hyfryd and surrounding area.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site need to isolate the power to other properties at 10:00am and we expect the power to be restored by 12noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:51am on 4th February 2021.
